pages.text: Spells that hit or affect an undead mob deal 2 damage in addition to their normal effects. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_aegis)Path of the Aegis$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter has found divine purpose in ridding the world of monsters. Imbues onto the Scepter of the Vanguard as you progress on the Vanguards Path of the Aegis
